## mcp-docs-server

- [MCP Docs Server](https://assistant-ui.com/docs/mcp-docs-server): Learn how to use the assistant-ui MCP documentation server in your IDE to access documentation and examples directly.

- [Using old React versions](https://assistant-ui.com/docs/react-compatibility): Guide for using assistant-ui with older React versions (18, 17, 16)

## api-reference

- [ThreadRuntime](https://assistant-ui.com/docs/api-reference/runtimes/ThreadRuntime):

- [ErrorPrimitive](https://assistant-ui.com/docs/api-reference/primitives/Error): 
- [MessagePrimitive](https://assistant-ui.com/docs/api-reference/primitives/Message): 
- [MessagePartPrimitive](https://assistant-ui.com/docs/api-reference/primitives/MessagePart): A part of a message's content. Message parts may be text, image, tool call or UI elements.
- [ThreadPrimitive](https://assistant-ui.com/docs/api-reference/primitives/Thread): 
- [ThreadListPrimitive](https://assistant-ui.com/docs/api-reference/primitives/ThreadList):
